description: CWE informational drawbacks within the OSRS CMCF are related to instances where information from an artifiact is found missing, irrelevant, not congruent, or not complete based on the information supplied within the artifact.  The informational drawbacks allow for the tracking of these types of informational defficiencies.
name: OSRS CWE Informational Drawbacks

values.description: The artifact contains CWE information that is uncertain, indefinite, or unclear of character or meaning.
values.value: OSRS CMCF CWE Informational Drawback: CWE Artifact Vague

values.description: The artifact contains CWE related information that does not align to the current CWE mapping.
values.value: OSRS CMCF CWE Informational Drawback: CWE No Relevant Category

values.description: The artifact relates to CWE information but does not sufficiently describe the event with enough context to understand which CWE to map to and so therefore the information that would explain this context is considered missing (or) absent.
values.value: OSRS CMCF CWE Informational Drawback: CWE Information Absent
